## arrGetAll

Retrieve all elements in provided indexes array.

### Parameters

-   `arr` **[Array][3]** The array
-   `indexes` **[Array][3]&lt;[number][4]>** An array of indexes to get

Returns **[Array][3]** The corresponding elements
